channel.title: Casting Ice barrage
channel.description: Okay guys,Ice blitz works on other people while pking-When I use ice barrage it sends tele requests,not the right emote,and always hits 0's. You can ice barrage NPC's at barrows or something Just fine.It just doesn't work on Other players while pking,Can somebody please help me fix this? All help appreciated!

item.title: Casting Ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Look for something like…

if (spellID == 12891) {

12891 is the ID of barrage. You should see it twice… If you don’t its ite…

If you have 2, copy the one that looks right, with the hitDiff, gfx, emote etc…

Then find the spell again… You should see sumit with…
sendRequest
sendTeleReq
TeleReq…
sendMessage(“You send tele requests!”);

Or sumit, just replace all that spell, with the one you copied…
Whaalallaa. Done

Read full topic

item.title: Casting Ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Okay guys,Ice blitz works on other people while pking-When I use ice barrage it sends tele requests,not the right emote,and always hits 0’s.
You can ice barrage NPC’s at barrows or something Just fine.It just doesn’t work on Other players while pking,Can somebody please help me fix this?
All help appreciated!

Read full topic
